entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Baccaro Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:43 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baccaro Point 6:00 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023
Temperature: -1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -2.2°C
Wind: NE 43 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending early this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast this evening. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low zero.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023
